snippet: The suspect, Eric Matthew Frein, was the subject of a wide search on Tuesday after the police obtained a warrant charging him with murder, among other offenses.
abstract: Pennsylvania authorities identify Eric Matthew Frein as the suspect in ambush at a state police barracks that left one trooper dead and another wounded; charges against Frein include murder and reckless endangerment, and he is still at large.

byline.contributor: Seamus McGraw contributed reporting from Canadensis, Pa. Susan Beachy contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The suspect, Eric Matthew Frein, was the subject of a wide search on Tuesday after the police obtained a warrant charging him with murder, among other offenses.

headline.main: Pennsylvania Officials Identify Suspect in Ambush at Barracks
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania Officials Identify Suspect in Ambush at Barracks
